However , patient ULMD high surgical risk score favourable anatomy still refer angioplasty . Recently , several study registry compare surgery percutaneous intervention drug elute stent report similar result regard cardiovascular death myocardial infarction patient multivessel coronary artery disease include unprotected leave main disease .
